name: AquaVibe EmberBottle
description:
Elevate your hydration game with the ultimate fusion of style and functionality. This innovative water bottle is designed to be more than just a hydration vessel; it’s a lifestyle companion that complements your active routine. With its sleek, modern design and vibrant color options, you can express your personality while staying refreshed on-the-go. Say goodbye to mundane water bottles and hello to a vibrant new way to hydrate.

Engineered with advanced double-wall vacuum insulation, this bottle keeps your beverages icy cold for up to 24 hours or piping hot for 12. Whether you crave chilled water after an intense workout or steaming tea during chilly mornings, this bottle effortlessly adapts to your needs. The stainless steel construction is not only durable but also resistant to rust and BPA-free,

I’ve been using this bottle for a few weeks now, and honestly it’s pretty decent, but not without its flaws. The design is nice and I like the idea of infusing flavors, which works okay for some fruits. However, I feel like the lid could be tighter because it leaks a little if I toss it in my bag. 

I also found that it doesn’t keep my water as cold as I hoped, maybe for a couple of hours? So, that’s a bit disappointing
